7a0796e3f2627ea2262df09b0deed561 (12:56): pctony,  i set it in a vhost.conf fiel now
7ac8f8cf65a7a0b4ea7635148640d197 (12:56): it *HAS* to be in the main config file, inside a <directory> block
7a0796e3f2627ea2262df09b0deed561 (12:56): but it gives me that error

b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (13:05): AllowOverride all is a really bad idea, because it implies AllowOverride Options, which lets people do stuff like Options FollowSymlinks and Options ExecCGI, even though they are explicitly disabled in the main config.
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (13:09): Options FollowSymLinks is Allows Apache to follow symbolic links
7ac8f8cf65a7a0b4ea7635148640d197 (13:10): that looks ok so long as it is in the main httpd.conf elderrr
7a0796e3f2627ea2262df09b0deed561 (13:16): pctony,   well i made it without setting AllowOverride=all and it works too, set only  Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
7a0796e3f2627ea2262df09b0deed561 (13:16): AllowOverride=all is not  needed i guess
7ac8f8cf65a7a0b4ea7635148640d197 (13:17): elderrr: in that case I guess it is already on somewhere
